QuestData.Title: Culling the Herd
QuestData.Description: It seems that Kael'thas' forces have twisted the Botanica's specimens beyond saving. I do not want to see them unleashed upon Outland as so many others have.$B$BThere is one, Laj, who I would like to examine. He is different somehow. Perhaps we can learn from him.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to kill 6 Mutate Fleshlashers, 6 Mutate Fear-shriekers, 6 Mutate Horrors, and to obtain a Rapidly Evolving Frond from Laj in the Botanica of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: I see you have obtained the frond. Very good.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well thus far, $n. However, there is still one more task I must ask that you complete.
